item.title: Shining stars: Herald-Tribune honors Sarasota's academic…
item.description: As the final cap-tosses settle and the last strains of "Pomp and Circumstance" fade, a new chapter has begun for thousands of young adults across Sarasota County. The 2024-2025 school year has drawn to a close, marking not an end, but a vibrant beginning for students poised to embark on paths to higher education, innovative careers, and impactful community contributions.

item.title: Legally blind Palm Beach County artist makes art that…
item.description: Stephanie Gowdy's nose just kept creeping closer to her phone screen. It happened so stealthily that the young artist, just 22 at the time, didn't notice how significantly her vision was failing until someone pointed it out. The eye appointment Gowdy thought might end with a pair of glasses, instead delivered devastating news: See a specialist; we can't help you, you're going blind.
